member.title_signup: If you would like to apply, please register as a new member here.
member.title_login: If you are already a member, please log in here.
member.description_member_registration1: If you wish to register as a member using customer information, please also enter the information below.
member.description_member_registration2: Once you register as a member, you can use the service without entering customer information when applying, requesting future materials, or consulting. Please note that your email address will be registered as your member ID.
member.placehoder_password: Describe password entry rules: half-width alphanumeric characters, etc.
member.placehoder_confirm_password: Please enter your password again to confirm.
member.forgot_password: If you forgot your password, click here

modal.login_failure: Your email address or password is incorrect.
modal.email_exists: This email address is already in use. Please use another email address.
modal.wrong_format: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long and must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one symbol.
